title: SJB not ready for interim Govt. with President and PM : Rajitha
body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) today said there are no plans of establishing an interim Government with President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the helm.
“We are prepared to form an interim Government only without the current Head of State and Prime Minister,” SJB MP Rajitha Senarathne told journalists today.
